originalText.text: This is not a good school. The nurse is the worst nurse ever. Once I was sick so I went to the nurses office and she told me to go back to class. And she yelled at me. Some of the teachers are not good like the chef. She gets mad over little things like if she tells me to pass her the sugar and I don't know where it is she gets mad. Like how are you going to get mad at me for not knowing where the stuff is. I can't read your mind. But I can say that the dean is very cool. I love the dean. But beside that the school is bad. Some of the kids are bad too

originalText.text: This school is Evreything the staff are so lively and fun to be around with so much personality there is so many things this school did to help me I thought I'd never succeed after dropping out but this place picked me back up, evreyone here and this school is fantastic and I wish the best for it thank you mhscd for everything and I really highly recommend this school for any students struggling like I did this place is a dream! ‚ù§Ô∏èüß°üíõüíöüíôüíú‚ù§Ô∏è
